p: Validation of each classification model was carried out by leave-one-out cross-validation and taking into account the accuracy (ACC), the precision or positive predictive value (PPV), the recall or sensitivity or true positive rate (TPR), specificity or true negative rate (TNR), receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curve and the Matthews correlation coefficient (MCC) (see Supplementary Information) [ 22, 60]. Y-scrambling [ 61, 62] was ultimately applied to check any lack of chance correlation and assess coefficients robustness.
